php.LBL_CONDITIONS_OF_REGISTRATION:
All data below must be true, it is an obligatory condition of registering the product that results from the license terms.  %s 
In order for the system to correctly verify the registration key, Cron must be active and function properly. 

The validity of data submitted during registration is verified within 72h. Providing any false data will cause the entire registration to be declined. Thank you for your patience.
%s
php.LBL_WEBSITE_INFO: Enter the entity's website or a personal website. DO NOT enter the URL where your CRM is installed.
php.LBL_VAT_ID_INFO: In case of companies, provide unique tax identifier applicable in the country, for example TAX ID: PL1180002425
php.LBL_LAST_SCAN_DATE: Datum des letzten Scans des Status der Registrierung
php.LBL_LAST_SCAN_ERROR:
Der Registrierungsstatus wurde nicht verifiziert:
- Ihr CRM hat keinen Internetzugang,
- Cron funktioniert nicht oder es gibt Fehler in seiner Bedienung,
- Fehler in der Serverkonfiguration
php.LBL_SYSTEM_NOT_REGISTERED: Das System YetiForce wurde nicht ordnungsgemäß registriert oder die angegebenen Daten sind falsch.
php.LBL_PAID_FN_NO_SUBSCRIPTION: Bezahlte Funktionen wurden im System %saktiviert, bitte erwerben Sie ein Abonnement.
php.LBL_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_FORM_DESCRIPTION: To continue, your email address needs to be verified.
php.LBL_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_FORM_2_DESCRIPTIO: Email with a verification code has been sent. Type the code below in order to proceed.
php.LBL_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_NON_ADMIN_DESCRIP: Verification of the administrator's e-mail address is in progress. You can start using the application after the process is finished.

php.LBL_SEND_EMAIL_FAILED: Failed to send verification email. Try again later. If the problem reoccurs, you can contact the service provider at help@yetiforce.com
